results.description: American Mikaela Shiffrin becomes the first skier to clinch World Cup victories in overall, slalom, giant slalom and super-G in the same season.

results.description: France's Alexis Pinturault wins combined gold after a brilliant slalom run at the Alpine Skiing World Championships in Are, Sweden, with Slovenian Stefan Hadalin in silver and Marco Schwarz of Austria taking bronze.
